entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is mentioned as one of the schools participating in the Triwizard Tournament. ("The delegations from Beauxbatons and Durmstrang will be arriving at 6 o'clock on Friday the 30th of October.")

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as one of the schools participating in the Triwizard Tournament. ("The delegations from Beauxbatons and Durmstrang will be arriving at 6 o'clock on Friday the 30th of October.")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who was targeted by Malfoy for being sacked. ("especially because Malfoy had done his very best to get Hagrid sacked the previous year.")

relationships.description: Beauxbatons and Durmstrang are participating in the Triwizard Tournament together. ("The delegations from Beauxbatons and Durmstrang will be arriving at 6 o'clock on Friday the 30th of October.")
